Job Description: Eligibility for applying:Candidates with the following educational backgroundEducationalB.E (Any branch) from IIT, NIT, BITSS.S.L.C / Xth Std -- 80% and aboveP.U.C / XII Std -- 80% and aboveMust be good in C prograaming, data structures and algorithms Knowledge of wireless protocols is a plusPrior work on NetSim a plusProcess of Selection: Aptitude Test, followed by Technical and HR interviewsDesignation: Software EngineerJob Description:Development of C libraries for protocols in the NetSim frameworkProtocol development in WiFi, 5G, IOT, and Mobile Adhoc NetworksEnhancement of the protocol stack, simulation kernel and post processing engine Simulation trace data analysis and machine learning
